"Class Skill [Sword Gear]
This is a skill to increase the performance of your sword weapon.

By attacking and building gear, your gear will rise and unlock levels 2 and 3.

As your Sword Gear rises, you unlock multiple beneficial enhancements, like shortening PA charge times."
